properties.areaDesc: St Ignace to False Detour Channel
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 10 at 3:08PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 35 kt and highest waves around 6
feet expected.

* WHERE...St Ignace to False Detour Channel.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous highest waves which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
